users.name: Dwayne Johnson
users.description: A mere man, but an immortal legend.

users.name: Ryan Susag
users.description: He appeared out of nowhere. Wednesday, we had one initiate, Thursday, two. No one questioned why. No one will question why.

users.name: Andy Windom
users.description: It is said that Andy cooked his first masterpiece in the late 1700's. Seven people tasted it and became so inspired they made a country.
